description: This Java class 'JwtService' provides functionality for issuing and validating JSON Web Tokens (JWTs), including token generation with claims, subject, issuer, expiration, and signing, as well as token parsing and validation.

classes.name: JwtService
classes.description: Service to issue and validate JWT tokens, with configurable secret, issuer, and token expiry details.

methods.name: generateToken
methods.description: Creates a JWT token with specified subject and claims, signed with the configured secret key.

methods.name: parse
methods.description: Validates and parses a JWT token, requiring the issuer to match the configured issuer.
